Annie and Steve are in the kitchen, sh's cooking. Steve reads out of the college brochure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok, you can take Women's Studies or Spanish...oooh The History of Wine. The phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie. It's Megan, Becca Leslie, Dana and Helen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Hi--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lillian's missing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean she's missing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were all supposed to get spray-tans today and she never showed up. No on's heard from her. She could be anywhere, doing anything! She could be ANYWHERE--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ, give me the God damn phone. Leslie grabs the phone from Megan.

dialogues.speaker: LESLIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Annie, it's Leslie. Look, I'm sure it's nothing to worry about. The weddin's the day after tomorrow, she's been really stressed, so she just probably freaked out and went somewhere. We just want to find her and probably talk her off a ledge. Any ideas?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, gosh I..I don't know. Um, I'll come to you guys. I'll be there in an hour and 45 minutes. I wanna help. Annie hangs up, grabs her keys. She stops, comes back and grabs a small paper bag, and runs out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the Science of Jazz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie pulls over. She puts the piece of paper in the small paper bag. She gets out of the car, leaving it running. A few seconds later she comes back without the bag. Takes a deep breath and drives away. INT. HELEN'S ESCALADE. 2 HOURS LATER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe she's at the park.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The park? Don't be stupid Dana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jeez, take it easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's closed is all I'm just saying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe she flew somewhere. Everyone always hides in Mexico.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think she'd leave the country. Maybe she went to the reservoir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would she go to the reservoir? Its just a big tank of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie and I sometimes go for our morning walk there. It's the next best thing to a lake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God! I think I know where she is. INT. HELEN'S ESCALADE. The girls drive on a dark road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much further?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're almost there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm think I'm getting carsick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that supposed to be a dig on my driving?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well you do speed up and slow down a lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't take a stunt driving course in Renegade missions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you always have to be so condescending?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, its getting really old.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was being funny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well it came out a little mean Helen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dana who's side are you on? All the girls start yelling. Helen loses control of the car for a split second and drives off the road hitting something. BOOM! The girls scream!!! She pulls over. All the girls are wide eyed and speechless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did we hit something!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was it a person?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys it's just a flat. I've gotten tons of them. Annie goes to get out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!/ Annie don't get out!/ It's pitch dark out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody calm down. I'm calling 911.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't call 911 for a flat tire! A huge truck drives by moving their car a little bit. The girls SCREAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! We're fine. Helen, put the hazards on. Helen puts them on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm calling AAA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm calling Kevin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen, do you have a jack?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if we get hit just sitting here? Or kidnapped or chased by an animal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dana calm down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit! I don't have any service.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me neither!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God! We're gonna die... Annie has had enough and gets out. The tire is definitely flat. She opens Hele's trunk, lifts the bottom (wherever the jack is in an Escalade] She goes up to the window. INT. HELEN'S ESCALADE. CONTINUOUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone's gotta get out, if you want me to fix this. They complain that its dangerous, i's cold, but they do. Annie puts the jack under car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, how can I help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold the flashlight. Leslie and Megan watch as Annie pumps the jack. She really does know what she's doing! The car is raising.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Megan hand me the wrench. Megan hands it to her. Annie starts to unscrew the lug nuts handing them to Megan, with Leslie by her side. Dana and Becca stand with Helen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's pretty cool she knows how to do change a tire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. I can't believe she's doing it. Dana and Becca move over to Annie. Helen waits alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just don't scratch anything. The girls are all crouched down to watch Annie in awe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what are you doing now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm removing the lug nuts so we can take the tire off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How does that little thing lift the whole car?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It uses hydraulic power. It gives a human being the lifting capacity of 1.5 to three tons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know this stuff?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like cars. There's a real artistry to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you guys working or talking? We do't have all night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quickly) Annie is doing the best she can Helen. So why don't you just stand over there and be quiet and wait.
Everyone's speechless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me?! Dana stands. She has had it with Helen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, will you, for once, shut the fuck up!!!?? Dana approaches Helen. The other girls are standing now.

dialogues.speaker: DANA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lillian probably left because of you anyway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so- bossy! You've been acting like you're in charge this whole time! Do't you realize how much pressure sh's under? You know, Lillian did not want to leave her reception in a unicorn-drawn carriage?! She said âThat's not me.â And you ordered it anyway! You've been pushing her this whole time! Annie was right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Helen glares at Megan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? The only reason you're even in this wedding is because you're the groom's sister. Weirdo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd rather be the groom's sister than have cameltoe from my $600 pants. We see that Helen has cameltoe. Megan has surprised them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is everyone attacking me? I wasn't the one who caused a huge scene at Lillian's bridal shower and made her cry.
Everyone looks at Annie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate to interrupt this riveting discussion but a really creepy guy in a Trans Am just pulled over. The guy gets out of the car. He is thirty-ish, wears at- shirt with a cat on it and camouflage shorts.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Hey it's pretty late. What are you ladies doing? Becca and Dana scramble into the woods. Leslie gets behind the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just changing the tire.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: You guys need some man hands for that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope I think we got it. But thank you. He doesn't leave, the girls worriedly look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Look, if you guys get tired, I live right up that hill. You ladies can just leave your car here, come on up and let us all lay down together. He starts to walk toward them. The girls are scared. Annie gives Megan a look. Megan tries to distract him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Are those snowflake rims? The guy looks at Megan.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Yeah, found âem in a junk yard. Restored âem myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet you got a formula 4OO under there?

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Well, well. Someone knows her cars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in the Firebird club.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: You don't say. I never met a lady in the FBC before. He walks over to Megan, she gives Annie a nod. Annie rushes to the tire and quickly continues changing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ever make it up to the Trans Am Nationals in Dayton? Becca, Dana, Leslie and Helen are huddled together. They talk in a loud whisper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening? What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can hear animals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be quiet! The guy is moving closer to Megan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember Smokey and the Bandit?

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: It's my favorite movie. âGive me a Diablo sandwich and a Dr. Pepper and make it quick . I'm in a goddamn hurry.â He leans into her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you show me what's under the hood? Back at Helen's car. Leslie sneaks over to Annie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it comin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there. The guy has lifted up his hood and Mega's looking. He puts his hands on her ass.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: You wanna get in the backseat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... He is really getting aggressive, pushing against her.

dialogues.speaker: MEGAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey take it easy!

dialogues.speaker: HELEN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey what about me? He turns around to be hit with a huge piece of wood by Helen. He falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God!! Annie is frantically releasing the jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, everybody in the car! Get in! Megan, Helen let's go! All the girls scramble in the car, Helen starts it. Annie is finishing.

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Hey you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie get in!

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: I'm gonna get you bitches!! He is coming towards Annie! She turns towards him with the jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back away! Or I will shove this Jack so far down your throat you will shit out...your fucking..face!

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa. Alright. Alright. I'm leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out!

dialogues.speaker: TRANS AM MAN
dialogues.text: I am! I live up the hill though if you change your mind. Annie backs up and jumps in the car. Helen peels away. The girls drive away fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girls still driving. Megan's eating chips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Megan I was freaked out when he leaned up against you. That was a pretty gutsy move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie's the one who tried to make him eat a car jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen hit him over the head with a tree. They all continue talking, Helen and Annie smile.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There it is, turn left up here. Go down the little hill. Ok, that's the driveway. It's dark and very rustic. It's LILLIAN'S LAKE HOUSE FROM THE FLASHBACK. Where Lillian and Dougie met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God I haven't been here in forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The house is right up here. They pull up to a small cottage and get out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her car's not here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't look like any lights are on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's not here. Annie is sitting on the front step, defeated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought she'd be here. I really thought she'd be here. I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie, it's ok.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's not. I don't know what happened. I messed everything up. Lillia's not even talking to me. I think I'm so afraid to see what's really happening. Lillian's moving on to this great life and I feel left behind. And know matter how hard I try, I don't fit in to her life now. Everyone is silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie, Lillian loves you. (beat] I know I haven't made things easy for you.. I don't have a life and I am bored. Perry is always away and I'm constantly alone and she's been there. And I've been a bridesmaid nine times and although I may have implied it, I....I've never been a Maid of Honor. I wanted to make everything special for Lillian because... I don't have a lot of friends. I wanted her to like me better and to impress her, and everyone else. And I'm just good at throwing parties. I always have been. In fact sometimes I think people only ask me to be in their wedding's because of that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lillian wouldn't do that. If she asked you to be in her wedding it's because you are her friend. Trust me. Dana is crying and takes a picture. The're both startled by the flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about the Sea World tickets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry that when I left the shower I told your neighbors you were shooting a porn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I didn't know that you did that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, well, sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I deserved it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must say you do put on some pretty spectacular events.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I'm really rich. They smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is getting pretty late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What should we do about Lillian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She'll come home when she's ready.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ANNIE HALLWAY. LATE THAT NIGHT
dialogues.text: Annie enters exhausted to find Lillian sitting against her door. Annie walks up and slides down to sit next to her. After a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Didn't mean to make anyone worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay. I really am sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry too. I didnt want things to turn out like this. I got so caught up in the frenzy of everything, wanting this one day to be perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well its easy to get caught up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it doesnt help that all my friends hate eachother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. But it's all good now. We all talked and everythings cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup, Helen and I are best friends now. We're going shopping for cream sweaters tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's really not so bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wish the wedding hadnt become about everything and everyone else but me and Dougie. And now, it's become this thing I never wanted. I did want simple. I wanted colored lanterns, twinkly lights and food everywhere. I wanted a DJ to play all those stupid wedding songs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not too late to have those things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I didn't know all the stuff you were going through too. Annie is clearly sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine. I just feel really lost right

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lillian hugs her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's going to change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God dont say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean between you and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to come in? Steve's home. This could be your last chance as a single woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooooo...

dialogues.speaker: EXT HIGHWAY. VERY EARLY NEXT MORNING
dialogues.text: The small paper bag sits on the side of the road. Cop car pulls up. This is Rhodes' spot, we've seen before. He gets out and walks over to it, confused. He picks it up and it says, âOfficer Rhodesâ. He's a little weary bu opens it and pulls out a note. âI hear you like moonpies.â He looks in the bag and smiles. EXT. WEDDING RECEPTION. BELMONT CLUB. DUSK. Becca and Kevin are slow dancing happily very much in love. Leslie and Paul dancing with two boys trying to join in. They are all happy, he rubs her stomach. Perry and Helen are dancing. They look like they are talking and working things out. He hugs her and kisses her. Lillian and Dougie dance into frame. They are very close. Smiling and kissing. They've never looked happier. She smiles at someone. It's Annie. Annie is watching everyone from the side, smiling also. Steve approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks a lot for bringing me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for coming with me. Megan appears on her other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, thanks for bringing him.

Megan winks at Steve, he grabs her hand and they go to dance. Annie is alone, watching everybody. We see the wedding as a whole. It's a beautiful event. Colored lanterns, twinkly lights, food everywhere. Simple, fun...very Lillian.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. RECEPTION. LATER
dialogues.text: Annie and Lillian walking out of the reception.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So when does school start?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A week. I'm scared. I'm gonna be the oldest one there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what? Now you can have an affair with your teacher and it won't be gross. They walk down the steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for everything today. Yo've been the best Maid of Honor ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (kidding) MMM. No. That's not true at all. You were pretty terrible. Today you were good. Annie sees the hotel shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I want to catch this shuttle back to the hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're always gonna be my best friend. They hug goodbye. She runs down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will see YOU in a couple weeks Mrs. Price!
Lillian waves goodbye and turns to go back inside. Annie runs towards the shuttle. She's too late. The shuttle drives away without her. She JUST missed it.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wait! Wait! Stop! Great. Of course. The shuttle is gone, but there's something that was on the other side of it.

dialogues.speaker: RHODES, (O.C.)
dialogues.text: Need a ride ma'am? It's Rhodes, leaning against his car like Jake in sixteen candles. Annie is all smiles and walks up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you know I was here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was really complicated. I remembered the name of this place, I called them up, told them I was a cop calling on official police business, doing a very big investigation and uh, made them tell me all the weddings they had planned for the next two months with a bride named Lillian. [ALT: I'm a cop] Annie smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. They're looking at each other, not knowing what to do.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So, did you get the moonpies?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you like' em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. No. I couldn't eat them. They were completely covered in ants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooo, I didn't think about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You probably should have put it in a plastic wrap or maybe a foil or something. Tupperware would've worked but then I'd have to get it back to you-I'm gonna kiss you right now so... He walks to her and takes her in his arms. They are about to kiss. Rhodes stops.

dialogues.speaker: RHODES
dialogues.text: I didn't want to miss my chance again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me neither. They MAKE OUT. The end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie is walking back to her hotel. A cop car pulls up next to her.

dialogues.speaker: RHODES, (O.C.)
dialogues.text: Need a ride ma'am? She turns to see Rhodes driving slowly next to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you know I was here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a cop. They're looking at each other, not knowing what to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, did you get the moonpies?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you like' em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. No. I couldn't eat them. They were completely covered in ants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooo, I didn't think about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The real reason I came here today is that I have something that belongs to you. He opens his hand to reveal the ugly carrot. She smiles. He stops the car and unlocks the passenger door. She gets in. They drive off into the sunset.
